decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The advertisment display hereby approved shall be for a period of 5 years
Condition : 2 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission
Condition : 3 - Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisments, shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site
Condition : 4 - Any structure or hoarding erected and used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public
Condition : 5 - Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity
description: Installation of one externally illuminated and one non illuminated fascia signs in association with the installation of a shopfront
